q1: How do I convert HP to kW?
a1: 1 HP (mechanical) â‰ˆ 0.7457 kW. Multiply HP by 0.7457.
q2: What is the difference between HP and PS?
a2: HP (mechanical horsepower) = 745.7W. PS (metric horsepower) = 735.5W. PS is used in Europe.
a3: Watts, kilowatts, megawatts, HP (mechanical), PS (metric), BTU/h, and foot-pounds/second.
